home.desc-portfolio-kaueGodoy: Responsive personal portfolio project, designed entirely for a game developer.
home.desc-portfolio-kaueGodoy-2: The project features a soundtrack, personalized navigation with a retro gaming theme, and it is also possible to access the developed games, information about the games, and about the author.
home.desc-plane: Responsive landing page for desktop and mobile, named "Plane". This page belongs to a travel agency that promotes cultural immersion in various countries, highlighting tourist attractions and renowned restaurants.
home.desc-plane-2: The design was inspired by a combination of references found on the Behance platform.
